content: t e w ole pattern is written out stitc by stitc since i couldn t fnd a way to convincingly c art t e process t e c art is added as a visual aid only to elp you understand w at it is supposed to look like please note as written all of t e rounds w ere you purl back do end on t e opposite site of t e marker t at indicates t e beginning of t e round but after t e next round you end up back again at t e marker aving completed 2 full rounds of knitting as wit any regular intarsia pattern w en you switc from one color to t e ot er you ave to twist t e yarns round eac ot er in order to avoid oles on every c ange of color marked by t e symbol tw in t e written directions you always pick up t e new color from under t e old one t us twisting t e 2 strands ere s a video to s ow you ow t is twisting can be done in englis and continental style watc from minute 2 30 to 3 30 and ignore all t e rest ttps //www youtube com/watc v=e_rktkkixhc pattern cuf wit mc loosely cast on 48 56 64 sts join for working in t e round and place a marker for t e beginning of t e round work 12 12 15 rounds of k1 p1 ribbing or work a k2 p2 rib if you prefer leg knit 3 5 5 rounds of stockinette in mc cat pattern section for ease of working it make sure all of t e 12 sts t at form t e cat motif are situated on t e same needle t ere s only one cat per sock t e ot er side of t e leg is plain stockinette in t e setup-for- eel section t e cat on one of t e socks gets s ifted to t e ot er side and you ll end up wit 2 socks t at are mirror images so don t worry about t at rig t now cat pattern work t e cat pattern as follows a mc k6 8 10 k2 join cc leaving a tail of at least 25cm/10 w ic will be used to work t e second ear of t e cat cc k1 tw mc k6 using tail end of cc k1 keep t e long foat between t e 2 cc-stitc es relaxed you can tuck it down later w en weaving in ends tw mc k2 k30 36 42 b mc k6 8 10 k2 tw cc k2 tw mc k4 tw using tail end of cc k2 t is is t e last use of t at tail end all t e rest of t e pattern is using t e working end of cc only tw mc
